verses.verse: The words <WH1697> of King <WH4428> Lemuel, <WH3927> the oracle <WH9294> which <WH834> his mother <WH517> taught <WH3256> him.
What, <WH4100> O my son <WH1248>? And what, <WH4100> O son <WH1248> of my womb <WH990>? And what, <WH4100> O son <WH1248> of my vows <WH5088>?
Do not give <WH5414> your strength <WH2428> to women, <WH802> Or your ways <WH1870> to that which destroys <WH4229> kings. <WH4428>
It is not for kings, <WH4428> O Lemuel, <WH3927> It is not for kings <WH4428> to drink <WH7941> wine, <WH3196> Or for rulers <WH7336> to desire <WH9001> strong <WH7941> drink, <WH8354>
Lest <WH6435> they drink <WH8354> and forget <WH7911> what is decreed, <WH2710> And pervert <WH8132> the rights <WH1779> of all <WH3605> the afflicted. <WH1121> <WH6040>
Give <WH5414> strong <WH7941> drink <WH7941> to him who is perishing, And wine <WH6> to him whose life <WH3196> is bitter. <WH5315>
Let him drink <WH8354> and forget <WH7911> his poverty, <WH7389> And remember <WH2142> his trouble <WH5999> no <WH3808> more. <WH5750>
Open <WH6605> your mouth <WH6310> for the dumb, <WH483> For the rights <WH1779> of all <WH3605> the unfortunate. <WH2475> <WH1121>
Open <WH6605> your mouth, <WH6310> judge <WH8199> righteously, <WH6664> And defend <WH1777> the rights <WH1779> of the afflicted <WH6041> and needy. <WH34>
An excellent <WH2428> wife, <WH802> who <WH4310> can find <WH4672>? For her worth <WH4377> is far <WH7350> above <WH4480> jewels. <WH6443>
The heart <WH3820> of her husband <WH1167> trusts <WH982> in her, And he will have <WH2637> no <WH3808> lack <WH2637> of gain. <WH7998>
She does <WH1580> him good <WH9185> and not evil <WH9563> All <WH3605> the days <WH3117> of her life. <WH9132>
She looks <WH1875> for wool <WH6785> and flax, <WH6593> And works <WH6213> with her hands <WH3709> in delight. <WH2656>
She is like merchant <WH5503> ships; <WH591> She brings <WH935> her food <WH3899> from afar. <WH4801>
She rises <WH6965> also while it is still <WH5750> night, <WH3915> And gives <WH5414> food <WH2964> to her household, <WH1004> And portions <WH2706> to her maidens. <WH5291>
She considers <WH2161> a field <WH7704> and buys <WH3947> it; From her earnings <WH6529> <WH3709> she plants <WH5193> a vineyard. <WH3754>
She girds <WH2296> herself <WH4975> with strength, <WH5797> And makes <WH553> her arms <WH2220> strong. <WH553>
She senses <WH2938> that her gain <WH5504> is good; <WH2896> Her lamp <WH5216> does not go <WH3518> out at night. <WH3915>
She stretches <WH7971> out her hands <WH3027> to the distaff, <WH3601> And her hands <WH3709> grasp <WH8551> the spindle. <WH6418>
She extends <WH6566> her hand <WH3027> to the poor; <WH6041> And she stretches <WH7971> out her hands <WH3027> to the needy. <WH34>
She is not afraid <WH3372> of the snow <WH7950> for her household, <WH1004> For all <WH3605> her household <WH1004> are clothed <WH3847> with scarlet. <WH8144>
She makes <WH6213> coverings <WH4765> for herself; Her clothing <WH3830> is fine <WH8336> linen <WH8336> and purple. <WH713>
Her husband <WH1167> is known <WH3045> in the gates, <WH8179> When he sits <WH3427> among <WH5973> the elders <WH2205> of the land. <WH776>
She makes <WH6213> linen <WH5466> garments <WH5466> and sells <WH4376> [them,] And supplies <WH5414> belts <WH2290> to the tradesmen. <WH9211>
Strength <WH5797> and dignity <WH1926> are her clothing, <WH3830> And she smiles <WH7832> at the future. <WH314> <WH3117>
She opens <WH6605> her mouth <WH6310> in wisdom, <WH2451> And the teaching <WH8451> of kindness <WH2617> is on her tongue. <WH3956>
She looks <WH6822> well <WH6822> to the ways <WH1979> of her household, <WH1004> And does not eat <WH398> the bread <WH3899> of idleness. <WH6104>
Her children <WH1121> rise <WH6965> up and bless <WH833> her; Her husband <WH1167> [also,] and he praises <WH1984> her, [saying: ]
"Many <WH7227> daughters <WH1323> have done <WH6213> nobly, <WH2428> But you excel <WH5927> them all. <WH3605>"
Charm <WH2580> is deceitful <WH8267> and beauty <WH3308> is vain, <WH1892> [But] a woman <WH802> who fears <WH3372> the Lord, <WH3068> she shall be praised. <WH1984>
Give <WH5414> her the product <WH6529> of her hands, <WH3027> And let her works <WH4639> praise <WH1984> her in the gates. <WH8179>
